Sentencas: Solid phase sintering is a critical process for fabricating mixed ionic and electronic conductivity (MIEC) electrodes.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: In this study, the microstructures of MIEC electrodes are numerically reconstructed by a Kinetic Monte Carlo method.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The performance of the reconstructed MIEC electrodes is then evaluated by a pore scale Lattice Boltzmann model.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The present study provides the first comprehensive assessment of local O-2 partial pressure on electrode performance.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: It is found that ohmic loss tends to play remarkable roles at a low O-2 partial pressure of p(O2) < 0.1 bar.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: As insufficiency of O-2 is almost unavoidable in the SOFC stack, the influence of local O-2 partial pressure on ionic conductivity should be considered in LSCF modeling.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Another important finding is that the initial states of compact powder have a profound impact on the electrode performance.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Small initial grain size and irregular particles both contribute to generate large reaction area after sintering thereby decrease activation loss.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: It is also found that compact powder consistency even plays a more important role in electrode performance than particle size.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The study also provides deep insight into influence of sintering process.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The effective conductivity of electrode is mainly controlled by the enhancement of electrode connectivity.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: Subsequently, nano-structured SOFC electrodes by infiltration/impregnation are reconstructed evaluated numerically.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The infiltrated electrodes demonstrate improved performance and significantly promote uniformity of reaction rates.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method

Sentencas: The present study forms a solid foundation for optimization of the fabrication procedures to improve the fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Reconstruction and optimization of LSCF cathode microstructure based on Kinetic Monte Carlo method and Lattice Boltzmann method
